Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    io.wcm.caravan.hal.resource.util.HalBuilder
    Will get removed
    io.wcm.caravan.hal.resource.util.HalCuriAugmenter
    This is replaced by HalDocsAugmenter from the io.wcm.caravan.hal.docs bundle.
    io.wcm.caravan.hal.resource.HalResourceFactory
    just create HalResource and Link instances using the new constructors
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    io.wcm.caravan.hal.resource.HalResourceFactory.convert(Object)
    use a Jackson ObjectMapper instead
    io.wcm.caravan.hal.resource.HalResourceFactory.createLink(String)
    use the constructor instead
    io.wcm.caravan.hal.resource.HalResourceFactory.createResource(ObjectNode, String)
    just create HalResource and Link instances using the new constructors
    io.wcm.caravan.hal.resource.HalResourceFactory.createResource(Object, String)
    just create HalResource and Link instances using the new constructors
    io.wcm.caravan.hal.resource.HalResourceFactory.createResource(String)
    just create HalResource and Link instances using the new constructors
    io.wcm.caravan.hal.resource.HalResourceFactory.getStateAsObject(HalResource, Class<T>)
    use HalResource.adaptTo(Class)
